text: Is there any way to receive data from an external system using webhooks or custom actions without building and hosting a bridge API that passes on data via the API?
Well that is what I ended up doing with the BLOCK flow. The problem is that the server response was taking too long to respond with the BLOCK, but I wasn't sure why
All I am doing is adding a task to a queue for processing, but my times were sometimes 10 seconds or more to respond to HubSpot. Note that this only happened when doing a bulk enrollment.
All other times the responses were within 1 second
Yeah for sure, what system are you trying to work with?
If you are using serverless, it could be cold starts occurring
